thread.title: Presidents Day celebrated at Garfield's home in Mentor (photos)
thread.title_full: Presidents Day celebrated at Garfield's home in Mentor (photos)

author: Lynn Ischay, The Plain Dealer
title: Presidents Day celebrated at Garfield's home in Mentor (photos)
text: Re-enactors for Presidents George Washington and Abraham Lincoln joined Lucretia Garfield in welcoming hundreds of visitor's to Lawnfield, President James A. Garfield's Mentor home on the grounds of the James A. Garfield National Historic Site. It was a way to have some fun while learning a little history on a day off from school. All national parks, including GNHS, dropped their fees on Monday.
